name: Rise of the UNBREAD
description:
In one fatefully dark night you could hear screams echoing from one of the small neighboring islands and as one of the mighty knights of the empire it is your job to come to the rescue.

Raise of the Unbread  is a small hack'n'slash game I created during the Scream Jam 21. In this game jam specificly I focused very much on looks and details like sound and particles and came up with a rather simple game mechanic. Hope you enjoy nonetheless! :)

Controls:

  • <WASD>   Move
  • <SPACE>   Dash
  • <F>   Energize
  • <MOUSE1>   Attack
  • <ESC>   Menu
